text: Jacques Calonne (10 August 1930 – 7 February 2022) was a Belgian artist, composer, singer, actor, logogramist, and writer. He was born in Mons, Belgium. In 1995 he played the rôle of the Representative of the Ministry of Culture in the 1996 movie Camping Cosmos. Calonne died on 7 February 2022 at his home in Brussels, Belgium at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Belgian artists Category:Belgian composers Category:Belgian singers Category:Belgian movie actors Category:Belgian novelists
title: Jacques Calonne
